article: The Art Festival in our school comes in November. It starts on  the first  Monday of November, and lasts a whole  _  ,so we have no lessons for seven days. This year, it is on November 7. And now we are  _  because we must get ready for it. The Art Festival show is usually  _  Monday afternoon. At the show, students and teachers sing and dance. And many parents come to  _  the show. This year, our class will dance at the show.  _  is a Uigurian dance. We will dance in special  _  .Girls wear long dresses and boys wear special  _  on their heads. We must  _  hard. And there is also a painting competition for the festival. I  _  my painting can get a prize .
